Indian Craftsmanship

Buying from Indian Artisans and Empowered Women inspires them to work harder, rather than relying on begging & donations, we can make India self-sufficient by buying from local. Let's also give people a second chance in life, by teaching them a new skill, which will help them get employed Let's buy and gift our dear ones some original handicraft products, which will not only make you happy but also support a poor artisan. Together let's give a chance to the people of India to be Independent.

Support > Donation

Let's Together make India Independent

{props.data ? props.data.map((d, i) => (
)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
